SCTX:
Begin racistSafe

short doOnce

; makes racists stop threatening Huleeya
; Main quest A1_7HuleeyaInformant

if ( doOnce = 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex A1_7HuleeyaInformant == 15 )
		if ( GetHealth > 0 )
			StopCombat
			SetFight 10
			SetDisposition 60
			set doOnce to 1	
		endif
	endif
endif

End
